Northen.Introduction:
Northern Dynasties include Chauhan Dynasty, Gadhaiya, Gurjuras Confederacy,
Kabul Shahi Dynasties,
Kingdom of Kangra,
Post-Hunnic dynasties of Kashmir,
Pratihara Empire and
Tomara dynasty.

Coin.Title: Jital - "Bronze" - Samanta deva - 850-1000 AD
Coin.Obverse:
Very clear devanagari letters on top of bull
Lettering: Sri Samanta deva
Coin.Reverse: No ruler name in front of the horse.
